title: Boone Cranx! Machined Aluminium Cranks boast aerodynamic drag reduction
content:
Around 25 years ago Boone Technologies halted production of bike parts, turning their attention to the manufacture of Titanium wedding rings. Ever since, they are frequently asked, “When are you going to make bike components again?”. The answer is now. Boone are back with one of the flashiest looking crank sets we’ve seen in some […]

The post Boone Cranx! Machined Aluminium Cranks boast aerodynamic drag reduction appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
